mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tag (name, user_id, create_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{userId}, #{createTime})
INSERT INTO book_tag (book_id, tag_id, user_id, create_time) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{tagId}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, bt.book_id FROM tag t JOIN book_tag bt ON t.id = bt.tag_id WHERE bt.book_id = #{bookId}
SELECT b.* FROM book b JOIN book_tag bt ON b.id = bt.book_id JOIN tag t ON bt.tag_id = t.id WHERE t.id = #{tagId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM book_tag WHERE tag_id = #{tagId}; DELETE FROM tag WHERE id = #{tagId}
